summary: The Fantastic Four, a superhero team from Marvel Comics, has had four live-action movies. The first two, released in 2005 and 2007, made a lot of money but got mixed reviews. A reboot in 2015 was a flop. Marvel Studios recently got the rights back and is making a new movie, "Fantastic Four: First Steps," set for 2025. The old movies are now called "Fantastic Adventures" on Disney+. The team consists of Reed Richards, Susan Storm, Ben Grimm, and Johnny Storm, who gain superpowers and learn to use them.
title: Fantastic Four in film
